No matching contact found on phone contacts but you can still send message by entering the email, userId or phone number

User Access and Consent to Use of Data\n

is in your personal name), and business name. You will ensure that the mobile number
provided for registration with the Licensed Application is your own and does not belong
to any third party and that it is a valid and existing mobile number. You will ensure that
you will not (i) use a business name of another person with an intent to impersonate that
person; (ii) use a business name in which another person has proprietary rights without
such person’s written authorization submitted to support@aqita.in; and (iii) use a
pseudonym or aliases as your business name. In order to connect with the relevant
customers, you can create a profile for your business by providing details like address,
description of business and services, pictures, etc\n
You agree to (a) provide true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself
as required during registration and in your profile and (b) maintain and promptly update
the information to keep it true, accurate, current and complete. If you provide any
information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, or if the Application

Payment Gateway\n\n
The Licensed Application makes available a payment gateway through its approved
payment processing provider(s). Your use of the payment gateway will be subject to
receiving an approved status by the Application Provider, fulfilling the documentation and

\n\nPAYMENT ACTIVATION\n\n
Aqita Business application offers chat services as the default feature for the partner.
Ability to take online payments is subject to additional registration with us based on the
Know Your Customer norms adherence. The policy and requirements to activate payments
for a particular partner is determined by Aqita in accordance with the law of the land.
Businesses which are prohibited by the law for taking online payments is not permitted to
take online payments via Aqita as well. Additionaly, any business, which voilates any law
can be deactivated by us immediately without further notice.
All the online payments going through Aqita will be subject to a fee known as Transaction
Discount Rate (TDR). The TDR applicable to your business will be communicated to you
via Aqita Business application, email, message on the app or any other form of
communication from the Aqita team. In case of any query about the same, you can write
to support@aqita.in
\n\nLicense, Rights and Deactivation\n\n
The license to the Licensed Application is effective until terminated by you or by the

(i) When you delete your account of your own accord or send an email to

Additionally, your rights under this license will terminate automatically without notice

[Note: Merely un-installing the Licensed Application from your mobile device will not
